akn:section.akn:heading: Destroying vines, bushes, shrubs, trees or protections thereof; penalty.

akn:content.akn:p: In the case of any tree 55 inches or greater in circumference when measured at a height of four and one half feet, a fine of not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01 or imprisonment for not more than 90 days, or both; or
For vines, bushes, shrubs, and smaller trees, a fine of not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01 or imprisonment for not more than 30 days, or both.
